info.title: CIS Middleware Documentation
info.description:
The purpose of this document is to describe data communication between Aggregator/Partner and GDIC CIS system



API is designed to accept service request in JSON format over HTTPS. JSON message is the body of HTTPS-GET or HTTPS-POST request. Once the request is processed, response is also provided in JSON format. Please note that content type and user authentication must be provided in the HTTPS-POST request. In authentication response client will get an access token. Access token will be needed for any other API calling of CIS middleware.

post.description: if agent found this will return agent information along with all his/her related documents

schema.$ref: #/components/schemas/Data Object Single«Agent response with related documents»

400.description: Bad request, i.e. The client's request is malformed or contains errors, making it impossible for the server to understand or process the request.

401.description: Unauthorized, i.e. 		The client's request is missing valid authentication credentials, or the provided credentials are invalid or insufficient to access the requested resource.

412.description: Precondition failed, i.e. The server received a client request with specific preconditions that were not met.

415.description: Method not allowed, i.e. The server cannot process the client's request because the provided media type or content format is not supported or acceptable.

500.description: Internal Server Error, i.e. The server encountered an unexpected error or condition that prevented it from processing the client's request.

data.description: The request body of 'add-master-document-dummy' API contains specific JSON format for 'data' parameter. It encapsulates information necessary for the API to process the request and produce the desired outcome. The 'data' parameter will contain specific JSON of the schema 'Add Document Request', Otherwise this will throw error or will not save the document.

get.description: After receiving a quotation, if a customer wishes to purchase the policy, certain input is required from the customer. This API, when called, dynamically populates the pre-required data necessary for policy purchase. The pre-requisite data is specific to the product and must be provided in the subsequent save API call to complete the purchase process.

get.description: "Refresh Token" is a crucial operation that facilitates prolonged user sessions. It allows users to obtain a new access token without re-entering their credentials. This operation takes a valid refresh token as input and, if authenticated, issues a fresh access token, maintaining the user's authenticated state. By seamlessly refreshing tokens, this operation enhances security and user experience by minimizing the need for frequent logins while ensuring continuous access to protected resources.

post.description: "User Authentication" operation serves to validate user credentials, ensuring the security of the authentication process. Upon successful verification, the operation generates an access token. This token acts as a secure authentication mechanism for subsequent requests, facilitating authorized access to protected resources within the application or API

currencyRate.description: Refers to the exchange rate between two currencies if the currencyType is not BDT. It will always converted to BDT from other currency.

currencyType.description: Refers to the specific currency denomination used in financial transaction.

documentNumber.description: Document/Documents number that/those are associated with the money receipt number.

mrAmount.description: the total sum of money received or collected for a particular transaction or financial activity. (net-premium + vat + stamp + charges) etc.

mrNumber.description: Unique system generated number to identify money receipt

mrStatus.description: Money Receipt status or the currenct situation of the money receipt

netPremium.description: Refers to the total amount of premium charged by an insurance company to provide coverage for a specific insurance policy, excluding any taxes, fees, or commissions

stampAmount.description: Stamp amount of the doucment calculated using stamp rate

sumInsured.description: The maximum amount of coverage provided by an insurance policy for a specific risk or asset.

forDataSave.description: Exact quotation response (get-quotation api response 'forDataSave' portion) must be send in this object

messageId.description: This API requires a unique message id to trace the requests and also checking for duplicate request. messageId is mandatory, unique and can not be null.

ppa.description: People's Personal Accident (PPA) product related details

agencyCode.description: Agency code of the agent, Can not be null, must be given while calling the API.

dateOfExpiry.description: Date of expiry of the agent's license

dateOfIssue.description: Date of issue of the agent's license

isActive.description: Indicates if the agent is currently active

uniqueAgentCode.description: Unique code assigned to the agent

ageLimitInfo.description: Age limit of the customer/client who are eligiable for this proudct

description.example: Some long text description of the prouduct

hasSubProduct.description: This product has sub-product or not?

productDetails.description: If the product has sub-products then this will be in use otherwise this will be null/empty

title.example: Full length title of the proudct

branchList.description: List of associated branches of the bank

placeVisitCode.description: Place visit code pre configured system value

coveredLimit.description: Covered Limit (the height limit of the coverage)

doctorId.description: Doctor ID (some unique identification of the Doctor)

medicalNonMedical.description: Medical or Non-Medical (Predefined System COnfiguration Value)

visitList.description: Business and Holidays place visit code list array

Business and Holidays Prerequisite For D.title: Business and Holidays Prerequisite For Data Save

textFields.description: Prerequisite text fields to save the document policy.

Business and Holidays Prerequisite For D.description: Business and Holidays Prerequisite For Data Save

Business and Holidays Quotation Prerequi.title: Business and Holidays Quotation Prerequisite Details

dropdowns.description: Dropdown values for Business and Holidays

textFields.description: Common text fields array with type and description

Business and Holidays Related text field.title: Business and Holidays Related text fields

name.example: custOccupation, custPasspostNo, custGender, interestInsured, reInsuredCountry, doctorId, planName, coveredLimit, insuredOccupation, employerName, employerAddress, officeTelephoneNo, nameOfTheUsualPhysician, physicianTelephoneNoOffice, physicianTelephoneNoHome, destCountryAddress, participant, visaType, sponsorName, destCountryCollege, destCountryOccupation, studyCourse, nextKinName, nextKinAddress, nextKinTelNo, nextKinRelationship, physicianHomeTelNo, regionOfCountry

required.description: Indicated whether the field is mandatory to give or not.

Business and Holidays Related text field.description: Business and Holidays Related text fields

claimsLossId.description: Unique identifier for the claims loss

dateOfIntimation.description: Date when the intimation of the loss was received

dateOfLoss.description: Date on which the loss actually occurred

dateOfPayment.description: Date on which the payment for the claim was made

document.description: Associated document details for the claim

lossYear.description: Year in which the loss occurred

natureOfLoss.description: Description or nature of the loss

required.description: Indicated whether the field is mandatory to give or not.

birthRegNo.description: Birth registration number of the customer

contactPerson.description: The user designated by Customer who will serve as the primary contact person

customerType.description: Type of customer {when customer is PERSONAL NID, Passport or Birth Reg no is required, and when BUSINESS there are ceitain logical required fields like (Registerd=BIN) (Proprietorship/Sole Trader = BIN or NID) (Partnership Firm=BIN or NID) (Society=NID) (Trade Org=NID) (NGO/Charitable Org = BIN or NID) (Foreign Org=BIN or NID)}

dateOfBirth.description: Date of birth of the customer format: (YYYY-MM-DD) (required for both new customer and existing customer)

mobileNo.description: Customer Valid Mobile Number (required for both new customer and existing customer)

nid.description: National ID number of the customer

officeContactNumber.description: Office contact number of the customer

passportExpireDate.description: Passport expiration date format: (YYYY-MM-DD) (if passport number is given then expiry date must be given)

passportNo.description: Passport number of the customer if any

spouseName.description: Spouse's name of the customer if any

tradeLicenceNo.description: Trade license number of the customer if any

bin.description: BIN (Business Identification Number). Mandatory for business customers.

companyType.description: Type of company (e.g., REGISTERED). Required for business customers.

customerGroupCode.description: Customer group code (e.g., UNILIVER). Required for business customers.

customerId.description: Customer ID. It will depend on whether it's a new customer or an existing one. customerId will given for existing customer otherwise it will be null

customerType.description: Type of customer (e.g., BUSINESS). Required for business customers.

dateOfBirth.description: Date of birth of the customer. Required for new PERSONAL customer.

email.description: Email address of the customer. Optional for personal/business customers.

fatherName.description: Father's name. Optional for personal/business customers.

firstName.description: First name of the customer. Required for new PERSONAL customer.

gender.description: Gender of the customer. Mandatory for personal customers. Required for new PERSONAL customer.

insuredAddress.description: Insured address. Mandatory for both existing and new customers. By default it can be customers permanent address. User can change the address as it will be consider as mailing address

mobileNo.description: Mobile number of the customer. Mandatory for both personal and business customers.

motherName.description: Mother's name. Optional for personal/business customers.

name.description: Full name of the customer. Required for new customer.

passportExpireDate.description: Passport expiration date (if applicable). Mandatory when passport number (passportNo) is given.

passportNo.description: Passport number (if available) of the customer.

permanentAddress.description: Permanent address of the customer. Required for both personal and business customers.

spouseName.description: Spouse's name. Optional for personal/business customers.

bin.description: BIN (Business Identification Number) of the customer

birthRegNo.description: Birth registration number of the customer

companyRegAuthority.description: Company registration authority of the customer

dateOfBirth.description: Date of birth of the customer format: (YYYY-MM-DD)

nid.description: National ID number of the customer

officeContactNumber.description: Office contact number of the customer

passportExpireDate.description: Passport expiry date of the customer

tin.description: TIN (Tax Identification Number) of the customer

tradeLicenceNo.description: Trade license number of the customer

bin.description: BIN (Business Identification Number) of the customer

birthRegNo.description: Birth registration number of the customer

companyRegAuthority.description: Company registration authority of the customer

dateOfBirth.description: Date of birth of the customer {format: (YYYY-MM-DD)}

email.description: Valid email address of the customer

isExemptedCustomer.description: Customer is Vat Exampted or not

mobileNos.description: Mobile numbers of the customer (if Customer have multiple mobile numbers)

nid.description: National ID number (NID) of the customer

officeContactNumber.description: Office contact number of the customer

passportExpireDate.description: Passport expiry date of the customer

tin.description: TIN (Tax Identification Number) of the customer

tradeLicenceNo.description: Trade license number of the customer

documents.description: List of document details relevant to the Customer

searchText.description: Value corresponding to the selected searchType.

searchType.description: Type of the search fields, can be mobile number, document number, loss id

Data Save Prerequisite.description: These are some of 'Data Save Prerequisite' for (add-master-document) api calling where different type of prequsite are needed.

collectionAccountNumber.description: Account number from which the collection was made

collectionAmount.description: Total amount collected for the deposit

depositBankName.description: Name of the bank where the deposit was made

depositSlipNo.description: Unique slip number for the deposit transaction

depositToAccountNumber.description: Account number where the deposit was made

depositeBranchName.description: Name of the branch where the deposit transaction was completed

paymentBankName.description: Name of the bank where the payment was processed

paymentBranchName.description: Name of the branch where the payment was made

paymentDate.description: Date when the payment was made {format: (YYYY-MM-DD)}

paymentNumber.description: Unique identifier or reference number for the payment

documentNumber.description: Document Number that you want to search

paymentMode.description: Mode of the payment by which the transaction made

documentValidFrom.description: Start date from which the document is considered valid

documentValidTo.description: End date until which the document is valid

mrList.description: List of Money Receipt (MR) numbers associated with this document

currencyRate.description: Exchange rate of the currency against base currency

currencyType.description: Currency type for the transaction, e.g., USD, BDT, EUR

documentType.description: Type of document, such as 'P' for type Policy, 'E' for type Endorsement

documentValidFrom.description: Date from which the document is valid {format: (YYYY-MM-DD)}

documentValidTo.description: Date until which the document remains valid {format: (YYYY-MM-DD)}

grossPremium.description: Final gross premium amount including VAT and stamp duty

netPremium.description: Net premium amount before VAT and other charges

stampDutyType.description: Type of stamp duty applied, e.g., 'Recoverable', 'Non-recoverable'

stampRate.description: Stamp duty rate applied on the transaction

sumInsured.description: Total sum insured under the document

vatAmount.description: Total VAT amount calculated on the net premium

vatRate.description: VAT rate applicable on the net premium

conversionRateUsdToBdt.description: Conversion rate from USD to BDT

coveredLimit.description: Policy Covered limit, When ensType=Employment, Default: 0, When applicable value will be 125000

numberOfChild.description: Number of children, When ensType=Employment, Default: 0

numberOfPerson.description: Number of persons, When ensType=Employment, Default: 1

placeVisitCode.description: Place visit code (pre configured system value)

coveredLimit.description: Covered Limit (Specific Value that will be covered under this policy)

doctorId.description: Doctor ID (some unique identification of the Doctor)

medicalNonMedical.description: Medical or Non-Medical (Predefined System Configuration Value)

textFields.description: Prerequisite text fields to save the document policy.

dropdowns.description: Dropdown values for Employment and Studies

textFields.description: Common text fields array with type and description

Employment and Studies Related text fiel.title: Employment and Studies Related text fields

name.example: custOccupation, custPasspostNo, custGender, interestInsured, reInsuredCountry, doctorId, planName, coveredLimit, insuredOccupation, employerName, employerAddress, officeTelephoneNo, nameOfTheUsualPhysician, physicianTelephoneNoOffice, physicianTelephoneNoHome, destCountryAddress, participant, visaType, sponsorName, destCountryCollege, destCountryOccupation, studyCourse, nextKinName, nextKinAddress, nextKinTelNo, nextKinRelationship, physicianHomeTelNo, regionOfCountry

required.description: Indicated whether the field is mandatory to give or not.

Employment and Studies Related text fiel.description: Employment and Studies Related text fields

ensTypeList.description: Type of the policy, Study or Employment

classCode.description: Class code is pre defined 3 characters system value refers to a specific class of a department.

currencyRate.description: Refers to the conversion amount to BDT

discountType.description: If the insurer provides any discuntns then there will be discount type base on the sutiation

grossPremium.description: The total/gross permium of the document like (net-premium + vat + stamp etc)

netPremium.description: Refers to the amount of money an insurance company collects from policyholders for providing insurance coverage, excluding any taxes, fees, commissions, or other expenses associated with the insurance policy.

othersCharge.description: If the document have any other changes

serviceCharge.description: service charge is a fee charged by a service provider for the services rendered to a customer or clien.

stampAmount.description: Stamp amount of the doucment calculated using stamp rate

sumInsured.description: Refers to the maximum amount of coverage provided by an insurance policy for a specific risk or peril.

vatAmount.description: Vat amount based on the vat type

vatType.description: Types of VAT like if Exampted then no vat will be applicable

breedOthers.description: Name of the breed when selected breed type is Others

breedType.description: Type of breed, Example: DOG, CAT

gender.description: Gender of the pet, Example: Male, Female

healthCondition.description: Health condition details of the pet, if any

isHealthy.description: Indicates if the pet is healthy

isVaccinated.description: Indicates if the pet is vaccinated

petAge.description: Age of the pet in the given age type

petAgeType.description: Pet age type for insurance, Example: Year, Month, Week, Days

relationship.description: Relationship of the owner with the pet, Example: Owner

vaccinationDetail.description: Details of vaccinations given to the pet

Get Customer By ID for LIMS middleware.title: Get Customer By ID for LIMS middleware

productList.description: List of Product Available for the Aggregetor

policyEndDate.description: Validity end date of the document

policyStartDate.description: Validity start date of the document

productCode.description: Product code system defined configuration data sent through get quotation prerequsite

productSpecificInfo.description: Specific product information like Nibedita info, Motor Info etc.

sumInsured.description: Sum insured amount (The sum insured amount refers to the maximum amount of money that the company agrees to pay out in the event of a covered loss or claim)

forDataSavePrerequisite.description: Prerequisite fields for data savings both text fields and dropdown. Not related with quotation getting, but need when save the document.

bin.description: Business Identification Number (BIN) of the customer.

birthRegNo.description: Birth registration number of the customer.

branchCode.description: Branch code where the customer is registered.

companyType.description: Type of company the customer is associated with.

contactPerson.description: Contact person for the customer, if applicable.

dateOfBirth.description: Date of birth of the customer.

drivingLinceseNo.description: Driving license number of the customer.

editDate.description: Last edit date of the customer record.

farmAddress.description: The address of the farm associated with the document.

flag.description: Flag indicating additional customer status or activity.

gender.description: Gender of the individual associated with the document.

groupCode.description: Group code associated with the customer.

lockStatus.description: Lock status of the customer profile.

middleName.description: Middle name of the customer, if applicable.

nid.description: National Identification Number (NID) of the customer.

occupationAddress.description: Address associated with the occupation of the customer.

officeName.description: Office name associated with the customer.

officeTelephone.description: Office telephone number of the customer.

permanentAddress.description: Permanent residential address of the customer.

presentAddress.description: Present residential address of the customer.

previousDocID.description: The ID of the previous document, if applicable, used for tracking document versions or history.

producer.description: Producer associated with the customer profile.

provenSourceOfIncome.description: Proof of income source for the customer.

registrationIssueDate.description: Date when the registration was issued.

registrationIssuePlace.description: Place where the registration was issued.

registrationNo.description: The unique registration number associated with the document.

residenceTelephone.description: Residence telephone number of the customer.

servicingBranch.description: Branch responsible for servicing the customer.

sourceOfIncome.description: Source of income for the customer.

spouseName.description: Spouse's name of the customer, if applicable.

tin.description: Tax Identification Number (TIN) of the customer.

tradeLicense.description: Trade license document of the customer.

tradeLicenseNo.description: Trade license number of the customer, if applicable.

typeOfBusiness.description: Type of business the customer is involved in.

union.description: The union council area where the farm or individual is located.

upozilaOrThana.description: The sub-district (Upozila or Thana) where the farm or individual is located.

village.description: The village where the farm or individual is located.

zila.description: The district (Zila) where the farm or individual is located.

action.description: The action to be performed, represented by an enum of possible API actions.

api.description: The name of the API endpoint or feature, represented by an enum.

asyncReplyFlag.description: Flag indicating whether the reply is asynchronous.

correlationID.description: An identifier used for correlating related messages, such as requests and replies.

messageID.description: A unique identifier for the message, useful for tracking and logging purposes.

replyAddress.description: The address where asynchronous replies should be sent, typically a queue or topic name.

request.description: The payload or request body, containing the actual data for the API operation.

source.description: The source of the API request, indicating the originating system or service.

timestamp.description: The timestamp of the request in ISO 8601 format, indicating when it was generated.

ageMonth.description: Age of the cattle in months, for more granular detail.

ageYear.description: Age of the cattle in years.

farmCatagory.description: Category of the farm where the cattle is located.

fromDate.description: Start date of the insurance coverage in ISO 8601 format.

grossPremium.description: Gross premium including VAT for the cattle insurance.

healthCardNo.description: Health card number associated with the cattle.

heightFeet.description: Height of the cattle in feet.

heightInches.description: Height of the cattle in inches.

loanAmount.description: Loan amount associated with the cattle.

marketPrice.description: Current market price of the cattle.

netPremium.description: Net premium for insuring the cattle.

tagID.description: Unique identifier for the cattle, typically a tag or RFID number.

toDate.description: End date of the insurance coverage in ISO 8601 format.

vat.description: Value-added tax (VAT) applied to the premium.

weight.description: Weight of the cattle in kilograms.

LiveStock common info and Cattle summary.title: LiveStock common info and Cattle summary

bankAccountNo.description: Bank account number associated with the loan.

bankBranchId.description: Unique identifier for the bank branch.

loanEndDate.description: Date when the loan ends, in ISO 8601 format.

loanStartDate.description: Date when the loan starts, in ISO 8601 format.

noOfLivestock.description: Number of livestock insured under the loan.

sumInsured.description: Sum insured under the loan coverage.

totalGrossPremium.description: Total gross premium amount for the insurance.

totalLoanAmount.description: Total loan amount in the applicable currency.

totalNetPremium.description: Total net premium amount for the insurance.

totalVat.description: Total VAT applied to the insurance premium.

typeOfLivestock.description: Type of livestock covered under the loan.

corporateAddress.description: If Corporate Client policy then corporate address.

corporateDistrict.description: If Corporate Client policy then corporate location district.

corporateEmpDesignation.description: If Corporate Client policy then corporate employee designation

corporateEmpId.description: If Corporate Client policy then corporate Employee ID.

corporateEmpName.description: If Corporate Client policy then corporate Employee Name.

corporateName.description: If Corporate Client policy then corporate Name.

corporatePolicyStatus.description: If Corporate Client policy then Value is YES else NO (Predefined YES/NO)

designation.description: Designation of the logged in user

employeeId.description: Employee ID of the logged in user

mobile.description: Mobile Number of the logged in user

name.example: BRAC Bank PLC, Mutual Trust Bank PLC etc.

role.description: Role of the logged in user

classCode.description: Class Code (Predefined System 3 Characters Class Code)

documentStatus.description: Document status refers to the current status of the document.

grossPremium.description: The total/gross permium of the document like (net-premium + vat + stamp etc)

netPremium.description: Refers to the amount of money an insurance company collects from policyholders for providing insurance coverage, excluding any taxes, fees, commissions, or other expenses associated with the insurance policy.

page.description: How many page you want to search liek 1 page or 10 pages.

size.description: The total number of search result you want.

currencyRate.description: Exchange rate applicable if a foreign currency was used, Default 1 when BDT.

customerList.description: List of customer details associated with the document

User Authentication Response After Succe.title: User Authentication Response After Successfull Authentication

accessToken.description: Access Token, which will be necessary for making further request almost everytime to validate authorization and security.

expiresIn.description: Time in seconds until the token expires

idToken.description: ID Token provides identity information about the authenticated user.

refreshToken.description: Refresh Token, which is required for getting new Access Token when current access token expires.

scope.description: Scope of token, what user is allowed to perform.

timestamp.description: Time and date of the execution
